long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
English Learning with Your Favorite Websites, YouTube Videos, and Netflix Movies

Master English at Your Own Pace with Kelimat, the ultimate language learning tool and Chrome extension. Seamlessly integrated into your online activities, Kelimat enhances your English learning experience as you browse websites, watch YouTube videos, and stream movies on Netflix.

Key Features:

Instant Word Definitions & AI Translation: Right-click on any word to see its meaning or translation in a clear popup powered by AI translation, making it easier to understand complex vocabulary.
Smart Word Highlighting: Kelimat automatically highlights and saves unfamiliar words, so you can easily revisit them later, boosting your vocabulary.
Personalized Practice: Go to your profile to review and practice the words you've saved, with tailored exercises to reinforce your learning and boost memory.
Boost Your Memory and Vocabulary:

Save and Review Words: Never forget a word again by saving unfamiliar words for later review.
Smart Word Highlighting: See words emphasized wherever you encounter them online, reinforcing memory and aiding in language acquisition.
Personalized Practice: Access tailored content, including engaging videos, articles, and AI-generated lessons.
Learn on the Go with Multilingual Support:

Netflix & YouTube Integration: Turn your favorite shows into interactive language lessons, perfect for ESL learners.
Efficient Learning: Seamlessly integrate language acquisition into your daily online activities with this user-friendly educational technology.
Supports Multiple Languages: Currently supports Arabic, Spanish, Russian, Mandarin, and French. More languages coming soon!
Start Learning Today:

Download Kelimat for Chrome and say goodbye to frustration and hello to English fluency. We're still in beta, so if you encounter any issues, let us know!
